text: The FDA doesn't need more funding, they need a plan. I voted no. There are alternative solutions: temporarily increase imports from other countries with safety standards just as high - if not higher - than our own. (2/2)

At the beginning of this week, I was told Speaker Pelosi was planning to bring a bill to the floor to purchase emergency formula for America's babies. Instead, the House just voted on a $28 million bill to give more funding to the FDA. (1/2)
